summary.span: 是 WPF 核心级实现的基类，这些实现是在 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 元素和基本表示特性上生成的。

span.span: is a base class for WPF core level implementations building on Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) elements and basic presentation characteristics.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是表示特定的三维元素的类派生自抽象基类。 is an abstract base class from which you can derive classes to represent specific 3D elements. 三维元素的输入、 焦点和事件处理行为通常中定义了许多类。Much of the input, focusing, and eventing behavior for 3D elements in general is defined in the class. 这包括键盘、 鼠标和触笔输入和相关的状态属性的事件。This includes the events for keyboard, mouse, and stylus input, and related status properties. 其中许多事件是路由的事件，并且有许多输入相关的事件的这两个冒泡路由版本，以及事件的隧道版本。Many of these events are routed events, and many of the input-related events have both a bubbling routing version as well as a tunneling version of the event. 这些成对的事件通常是控件作者最感兴趣的事件。These paired events are typically the events of greatest interest to control authors. 此外包括[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]与相关[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]事件模型，包括可以引发指定的方法路由源自元素实例的事件。 also includes [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] that relate to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] event model, including methods that can raise specified routed events that are sourced from an element instance. A具有以下功能专门定义的类：A has the following capabilities that are specifically defined by the class: - 可响应用户输入 (包括控件的输入通过处理事件的发送位置路由或路由的命令)。Can respond to user input (including control of where input is sent via handling of event routing or routing of commands). - 可以引发逻辑元素树路由的路由的事件。Can raise routed events that travel a route through the logical element tree. > [!IMPORTANT] > 状态将影响处理由该元素的所有输入。 state affects all input handling by that element. 不可见的元素不参与的命中测试和不接收输入的事件，即使鼠标位于将元素的边界如果可见。Elements that are not visible do not participate in hit testing and do not receive input events, even if the mouse is over the bounds of where the element would be if were visible. 与不同类，类不包括布局。Unlike the class, the class does not include layout. 因此，类不包括**度量值**或**排列**方法。Therefore, the class does not include **Measure** or **Arrange** methods. 派生自的类并维护其自己的集合的对象通过重写和必须仍传递新对象添加到。A class that derives from and maintains its own collection of objects by overriding and must still pass new objects to . 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从派生类，以创建`Sphere`类：The following example shows how to derive from the class to create a `Sphere` class: [!code-csharp[Shapes#Sphere](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Shapes/CSharp/Sphere.cs#sphere)] [!code-vb[Shapes#Sphere](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Shapes/visualbasic/sphere.vb#sphere)] 有关完整的示例，请参阅[UIElement3D 球示例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160044)。For the complete sample, see [UIElement3D Sphere Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160044).

span.span: Adds a routed event handler for a specified routed event, adding the handler to the handler collection on the current element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将同一事件的同一处理程序添加多次而不会引发异常。You can add the same handler for the same event multiple times without raising an exception. 但是，该处理程序实际调用的多次处理该事件时。However, the handler is actually invoked multiple times when the event is handled. 因此，请考虑如何此行为可能会产生的负面影响，应考虑在处理程序实现。Therefore, consider how this behavior might have side effects that should be accounted for in your handler implementation. 通常使用此方法来提供的"添加"访问器实现[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]事件的自定义的路由事件的访问模式。You typically use this method to provide the implementation of the "add" accessor for the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] event access pattern of a custom routed event. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

param.name: handledEventsToo
param.span: 如果为 ，则将按以下方式注册处理程序：即使路由事件在其事件数据中标记为已处理，也会调用处理程序；如果为 ，则使用默认条件注册处理程序，即当路由事件被标记为已处理时，将不调用处理程序。

span.span: to register the handler such that it is invoked even when the routed event is marked handled in its event data; to register the handler with the default condition that it will not be invoked if the routed event is already marked handled.
The default is .

param.span: 请勿定期请求重新处理路由事件。

summary.span: 为指定的路由事件添加路由事件处理程序，并将该处理程序添加到当前元素的处理程序集合中。

span.span: Adds a routed event handler for a specified routed event, adding the handler to the handler collection on the current element.

summary.span: 将 指定为 ，可为已标记为由事件路由中的其他元素处理的路由事件调用所提供的处理程序。

span.span: Specify as to have the provided handler be invoked for routed event that had already been marked as handled by another element along the event route.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理低级别的输入的事件中切实可行的方法是一个复杂的任务。Processing low-level input events in a practical way is a complex task. 许多控件实现的行为其中特定事件被标记为已处理，而替换为另一个更直观的事件。Many controls implement behavior where a certain event is marked as handled, and is replaced by another more intuitive event. 通常情况下，控制为已处理某个设计意图要求这样做是否只是标注平台输入的事件。Generally, a control will only mark a platform input event as handled if there is some design intention for doing so. 在某些情况下，这些设计意图可能不是你的输入事件的特定处理的要求。In certain scenarios, those design intentions might not be what your particular handling of the input event requires. 它为这些方案是该注册处理程序替换`handledEventsToo`作为`true`适合。It is for these scenarios that registering handlers with `handledEventsToo` as `true` is appropriate. 但你不应该这样做例行。But you should not do this routinely. 调用以响应所有事件处理程序，即使处理将使你自己的应用程序事件处理逻辑。Invoking handlers in response to all events even if handled will complicate your own application event processing logic. 如果处理程序逻辑是庞大，可能会看到导致性能降低。You may see a decrease in performance if the handler logic is substantial. 你应保留使用附加的已处理事件的情况下，你已检测到在开发过程中，某些控件正在处理你仍想要使用应用程序逻辑处理的事件的处理程序。You should reserve the use of attaching handlers for already-handled events for situations where you have already discovered during the development process that certain controls are handling events that you still want to handle with application logic. 避免处理的某些事件控件组合的行为的类的另一种方法是使用该事件的预览版的替代项。Another technique for avoiding the class handling behavior of certain event-control combinations is to use that event's preview alternative. 例如，如果标记为已处理类处理，你可能能够为添加处理程序相反。For example, if is marked handled by class handling, you might be able to add handlers for instead. 可以将同一事件的同一处理程序添加多次而不会引发异常。You can add the same handler for the same event multiple times without raising an exception. 但是，该处理程序实际调用的多次处理该事件时。However, the handler is actually invoked multiple times when the event is handled. 因此，请考虑如何此行为可能会产生的负面影响，应考虑在处理程序实现。Therefore, consider how this behavior might have side effects that should be accounted for in your handler implementation. 通常使用此方法来提供的"添加"访问器实现[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]事件的自定义的路由事件的访问模式。You typically use this method to provide the implementation of the "add" accessor for the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] event access pattern of a custom routed event. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 拖放操作默认情况下，不启用和必须通过设置有意启用到`true`。Drag-and-drop operations are not enabled by default, and must be enabled deliberately by setting to `true`. 除了此基本设置，拖放行为完全是特定的实现，并且未定义的或任何其他类，该类。Beyond this basic setting, drag-and-drop behavior is entirely implementation specific and is not defined by or any other base element class. 例如，某些控件，是否有一个默认行为。Certain controls, for example, , do have a default behavior. 拖放的详细信息，请参阅[拖放概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/drag-and-drop-overview.md)。For more information on drag and drop, see [Drag and Drop Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/drag-and-drop-overview.md). 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要捕获，必须启用一个元素。To be captured, an element must be enabled. 检查是否是`true`之前调用。Check whether is `true` before you call . 如果调用返回`true`，然后也`true`。If calling returns `true`, then is also `true`. 如果调用返回`true`，则和引发的事件，与在事件数据报告为元素其中调用方法。If calling returns `true`, then the and events are raised, with in the event data reported as the element where the method is called. 如果强制捕获时，你可能干扰现有捕获-尤其是在具有与拖放与鼠标相关的捕获。If you force capture, you might interfere with existing captures—especially with captures that relate to drag-and-drop with the mouse. 若要清除从所有元素的鼠标捕获，请调用与`element`参数作为提供`null`。To clear mouse capture from all elements, call with the `element` parameter provided as `null`. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 始终根据基础默认触笔设备的默认实现返回`true`。The default implementation based on the underlying default stylus device always returns `true`. 但是，如果你要扩展提供在输入系统的设备实现的输入的设备，则可能与一个备用的触笔设备实现，可能会返回不同的结果中创建系统。However, if you are extending the input devices that provide the device implementation for the input system, it is possible to create a system with an alternative stylus device implementation that might return different results. 当元素捕获触笔时，它会接收触笔输入，即使触笔超出界限。When an element captures the stylus, it receives stylus input even if the stylus is outside its bounds. 通常，将触笔捕获仅在拖放操作过程。The stylus is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations. 调用此方法调用基础静态方法。Calling this method calls an underlying static method . 由活动的触笔设备实现实现实际捕获行为。The actual capture behavior is implemented by the active stylus device implementation. 若要捕获，必须启用一个元素。To be captured, an element must be enabled. 检查是否是`true`返回你在调用之前。Check whether is `true` return before you call . 如果调用返回`true`，也`true`。If calling returns `true`, is also `true`. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Focus() cil managed

summary.span: 尝试对此元素设置逻辑焦点。

span.span: Attempts to set the logical focus on this element.

returns.span: 如果逻辑焦点和键盘焦点都设定到此元素上，则为 ；如果仅设定逻辑焦点，则为 。

span.span: if both logical and keyboard focus were set to this element; if only logical focus was set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可获得焦点，和必须都是`true`。To be focusable, and must both be `true`. 即使元素是特定的树中的焦点并已启用，事件处理，（例如，用于复合控件） 可能会响应预览焦点事件通过不允许焦点，因此此方法将返回`false`。Even if an element is focusable and enabled, event handling within a specific tree, (such as for a composite control) might respond to the preview focus events by not allowing focus there, thus this method would return `false`. 如果调用返回`true`，和也`true`。If calling returns `true`, and are also `true`. 如果相关的属性不是已`true`，则在调用，一个或多个以下事件将按照以下顺序引发： ， （来源为新的焦点目标）， ， ，， （来源为新的焦点目标）。If the related properties are not already `true`, when you call , one or more of the following events are raised in the following order: , (source is the new focus target), , , , (source is the new focus target). 在此调用会成功，需以前就具有焦点的应用程序中的某些其他元素的顺序。In order for this call to be successful, some other element in the application needed to have focus previously. 焦点通常由两个不同的概念： 键盘焦点和逻辑焦点，并不总是相同。Focus in general is governed by two separate concepts: keyboard focus and logical focus, which are not always identical. 此方法将逻辑焦点，设置，还将尝试设置键盘焦点。This method sets the logical focus, and also attempts to set the keyboard focus. 没有要将键盘焦点置于具体而言，由于用户输入将发生这种情况的编程方法。There is no programmatic means to set keyboard focus specifically, this happens due to user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示元素能否得到焦点。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the element can receive focus.

value.span: 如果该元素可获得焦点，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the element is focusable; otherwise .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有焦点的元素收到键盘输入。Only the focused element receives keyboard input. 是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]它实际上是依赖项属性的属性访问器。 is the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] property accessor for what is in reality a dependency property. 此特定的依赖项属性非常普遍地具有派生的元素的类以不同方式设置其原本"默认"值。This particular dependency property quite frequently has its apparent "default" value set differently in derived element classes. 这通常发生在两种方式之一：This commonly occurs in one of two ways: - 依赖项属性继承的特定派生类中，但该派生类重写依赖项属性的元数据，更改属性默认值。The dependency property is inherited by a particular derived class, but that derived class overrides the metadata of the dependency property and changes the property default value. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，如果不存在可视父级，则返回其他[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 父级。

returns.span: 如果派生类的实现具有要报告的替代父级连接，则为一个对象。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的默认虚拟实现返回`null`。The default virtual implementation of this method returns `null`. 提供实际实现。 provides a practical implementation. 备用父级是用于路由事件，在其中元素创建备用父级结构，以便其事件路由偏离到标准的父级的可视化树向上路由的标准模式的方式的情况下或向下预览路由策略。Alternative parents are used for event routing, in cases where an element creates an alternative parent structure so that its events are routed in a way that diverges from the standard pattern of routing up the visual tree to the standard parent, or downward in the preview routing strategy. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件允许拖动事件，以便为用户可视反馈提供拖放操作期间修改鼠标指针的外观的源。The event allows the source of a drag event to modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation. 视觉反馈用于强调拖放操作正在进行。The visual feedback reinforces that a drag-and-drop operation is in process. 此事件创建一个别名附加此类事件，以便摘自类的成员列出时为该类继承。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件处理程序附加到事件附加到基础附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的隧道事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 重写实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 在此元素获得逻辑焦点时发生。

span.span: Occurs when this element gets logical focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有意通过某个方法调用强制焦点，而前一个键盘焦点位于不同的范围内，则逻辑焦点将与键盘焦点不同。Logical focus differs from keyboard focus if focus is deliberately forced by using a method call but the previous keyboard focus exists in a different scope. 在这种情况下，键盘焦点将保持其所在的元素的和其中调用方法仍获取逻辑焦点。In this scenario, keyboard focus remains where it is and the element where a method is called still gets logical focus. 此事件的更精确地解释是它时引发的值路线中的元素的属性更改从`false`到`true`。A more precise interpretation of this event is that it is raised when the value of the property of an element in the route is changed from `false` to `true`. 由于此事件使用冒泡路由，接收到焦点的元素可能是而不是元素的子元素实际附加事件处理程序。Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that receives focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 检查事件数据以确定实际获得焦点的元素中。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that gained focus. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 没有相应隧道事件。There is no corresponding tunneling event. - 重写实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 有关注册路由事件的更多信息，请参见 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的更多信息，请参见 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see . 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event GotKeyboardFocus As KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler

summary.span: 在此元素聚焦于键盘时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the keyboard is focused on this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个类似事件，跟踪中维护的一个元素; 的焦点状态的属性的状态更改在很多相同的情况下引发事件。 is a similar event that tracks status changes in a property that maintains the focus state for an element; the event is raised in many of the same circumstances. 由于此事件使用冒泡路由，具有焦点的元素可能是而不是元素的子元素实际附加事件处理程序。Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that has focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 检查事件数据以确定实际具有焦点的元素中。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that has focus. 此事件创建一个别名附加此类事件，以便摘自类的成员列出时为该类继承。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件处理程序附加到事件附加到基础附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的隧道事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 重写实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 在此元素捕获鼠标时发生。

span.span: Occurs when this element captures the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在元素捕获鼠标，它会接收鼠标输入，即使在鼠标指针位于超出界限。When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input even if the mouse pointer is outside its bounds. 鼠标通常仅在拖放操作期间捕获，并且将保持捕获，直到发生拖放操作。The mouse is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations and remains captured until the drop action of the drag-and-drop operation occurs. 由于此事件使用冒泡路由，具有捕获的元素可能是而不是元素的子元素实际附加事件处理程序。Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that has capture might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 检查在事件数据以确定实际的元素具有鼠标捕获。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that has mouse capture. 此事件创建一个别名附加此类事件，以便摘自类的成员列出时为该类继承。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件处理程序附加到事件附加到基础附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 没有定义相应隧道事件。There is no defined corresponding tunneling event. - 重写实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 获取与此元素关联的输入绑定的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of input bindings associated with this element.

value.span: 输入绑定的集合。

span.span: The collection of input bindings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 输入的绑定支持命令来输入设备的绑定。Input bindings support the binding of commands to input devices. 例如，实现的输入包括特定于鼠标设备的属性的绑定。For example, implements input bindings that include properties that are particular to mouse devices. 适用于类型的输入的绑定以及输入声明的实例的绑定，将包括的输入绑定的集合。The collection of input bindings will include both input bindings that pertain to the type as well as input bindings that are declared on the instance. 相关的属性， ，保持命令绑定的集合。A related property, , maintains a collection of command bindings. 这些不同于输入绑定，因为它们表示下一个级别的命令处理的操作依赖于已知的命令。These differ from input bindings in that they represent the next level down of command processing - actions that are tied to known commands. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreInputBindings**oneOrMoreInputBindings* 一个或多个元素 (通常或派生类)。One or more elements (typically the or derived classes). 其中每个都应和属性设置。Each of these is expected to have a and attribute set.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void InvalidateModel() cil managed

summary.span: 使表示元素的模型无效。

span.span: Invalidates the model that represents the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你从派生类类，你可以使用此方法连同方法来刷新元素的模型。When you derive a class from the class, you can use this method together with the method to refresh the model of the element. 只需在高级方案中调用此方法。You only need to call this method in advanced scenarios. 如果派生的类具有的外观的多个属性，并且你想要一次更新的基础模型，这种类型的一个高级的方案。One such advanced scenario is if the derived class has multiple properties that affect the appearance, and you want to update the underlying model only once. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从派生类，以创建`Sphere`类：The following example shows how to derive from the class to create a `Sphere` class: [!code-csharp[Shapes#Sphere](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Shapes/CSharp/Sphere.cs#sphere)] [!code-vb[Shapes#Sphere](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Shapes/visualbasic/sphere.vb#sphere)] 有关完整的示例，请参阅[UIElement3D 球示例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160044)。For the complete sample, see [UIElement3D Sphere Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160044).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，此属性会影响的类特定于实现对于特定的元素，通常在运行时。Note that this property is influenced by class-specific implementations of on particular elements, often at runtime. 因此，此处列出的默认值有时不是有效。Therefore, the default value listed here is sometimes not effective. 正在尝试设置此值将也有可能被替代返回的值。Attempting to set this value will also potentially be overridden by the value returned by . 未启用的元素不参与命中测试或获得焦点，并因此将不会输入事件的源。Elements that are not enabled do not participate in hit testing or focus and therefore will not be sources of input events. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值确定此元素是否具有逻辑焦点。

span.span: Gets a value that determines whether this element has logical focus.

value.span: 如果此元素具有逻辑焦点，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this element has logical focus; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果应用程序中有多个焦点分支，例如，菜单的内容和应用程序的其余部分之间，逻辑焦点将与键盘焦点可能会与不同。Logical focus might differ from keyboard focus if an application has multiple focus divisions, such as between menu contents and the remainder of the application. 在此方案中，键盘焦点仅可在应用程序 UI 的一个元素，但是，其他焦点分支中的某些元素仍可能保留逻辑焦点。In this scenario, keyboard focus can only be on one element of the application UI, however, certain elements in other focus divisions might still retain logical focus. 有关逻辑焦点的详细信息，请参阅[焦点概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md)。For more information on logical focus, see [Focus Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md). 通过设置此属性 （它是只读的） 未设置焦点。You do not set focus by setting this property (it is read-only). 此属性的典型用途是将其用作依赖项属性的或。The typical use for this property is to use it as a dependency property for a or . 若要以编程方式设置焦点，请调用。To set focus programmatically, call . 由用户操作或控件实现，其中可能包括鼠标捕获行为，则还可以设置焦点。Focus can also be set by user action or by control implementations, which possibly include mouse capture behavior. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsHitTestVisible { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值声明是否可以返回此元素作为其呈现内容的某些部分的点击测试结果。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that declares whether this element can possibly be returned as a hit test result from some portion of its rendered content.

value.span: 如果此元素可以从至少一个点上作为命中测试结果返回，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if this element could be returned as a hit test result from at least one point; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的有效值受命中可测试的元素的逻辑树中的相对位置。The effective value of this property is influenced by the relative positions of hit testable elements in the logical tree. 例如，如果一个元素的子元素的元素将是不会命中测试可见，对子属性的有效值将保持`false`，即使尝试本地设置该值。For instance, if an element is a child element of an element that is not hit test visible, the effective value of the property on the child will remain `false`, even if attempting to set that value locally. 为此，务必不要设置到`false`复合控件除非你不需要任何输入或命中测试该控件上。For this reason, it is important that you do not set to `false` on a composited control unless you do not want any input or hit testing on that control. 有关命中测试的详细信息，请参阅[可视化层中的命中测试](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/hit-testing-in-the-visual-layer.md)。For more information on hit testing, see [Hit Testing in the Visual Layer](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/hit-testing-in-the-visual-layer.md). 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

value.span: 如果鼠标指针位于与命中测试; 相同的元素结果否则为。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与不同，此属性才`true`如果鼠标指针位于 literal 元素-按原样命中测试。Unlike , this property is only `true` if the mouse pointer is over the literal element—as it is for a hit test. 而如果鼠标指针悬停在子元素上，此属性将`false`。If the mouse pointer is instead over a child element, this property will be `false`. 对于大多数情况下不创作控件的情况，使用相反。For most scenarios where you are not authoring controls, use instead. 如果此元素是否捕获了鼠标，并且此属性是`true`在捕获时，此属性将继续返回`true`丢失鼠标捕获并且鼠标指针不位于其边界之前。If the mouse is captured by this element, and this property is `true` at time of capture, this property will continue to return `true` until mouse capture is lost and the pointer is not over its bounds. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

public: property bool IsMouseOver { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示鼠标指针是否位于此元素（包括可视化树中的子元素）的上方。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the mouse pointer is located over this element (including child elements in the visual tree).

value.span: 如果鼠标指针悬停于此元素或其子元素上，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，控件都是复合，以便控件 （可视树） 中的各种元素都将报告包含控件的鼠标状态。Typically, controls are composited such that the various elements inside the control (the visual tree) will all report the mouse state for the containing control. 例如，样式控件将报告作为`true`如果鼠标位于其几何图形，包括任何。For example, a style control will report as `true` if the mouse is anywhere over its geometry, including any . 尽管类似"等效于"事件不存在，将执行多个类似事件。Although an analogous "IsMouseOverChanged" event does not exist, several similar events do. 例如，你可以处理， ，和。For example, you can handle , , and . 如果此元素捕获鼠标，则此属性保持`true`丢失鼠标捕获并且鼠标指针离开元素边界之前。If this element captures the mouse, this property remains `true` until mouse capture is lost and the mouse pointer leaves the element bounds. 某些控件有意捕获鼠标似乎未直接涉及鼠标某些操作。Some controls deliberately capture the mouse on certain actions that do not appear to directly involve the mouse. 这可能会导致正在`true`即使看似未移动鼠标。This can lead to being `true` even though the mouse has not apparently moved. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与不同，此属性才`true`如果触笔位于元素上。Unlike , this property is only `true` if the stylus is over the element. 如果触笔改为子元素或元素上方的元素的更深入地组合 （可视树） 的一部分，此属性将`false`。If the stylus is instead over a child element or over elements that are part of an element's deeper compositing (the visual tree), this property will be `false`. 除非你知道如何控件的组合 （例如，你使用此属性在自定义控件模板中的控件，你定义），此属性可能会返回意外的结果。Unless you know how a control is composited (for example, you use this property in a custom control template for a control that you define), this property might return unexpected results. 对于大多数情况下不创作控件的情况，使用相反。For most scenarios where you are not authoring controls, use instead. 如果此元素具有触笔捕获，并且此属性为`true`捕获时，此属性将保持`true`丢失触笔捕获并且触笔不到其边界之前。If this element has stylus capture and this property is `true` at the time of capture, this property remains `true` until stylus capture is lost and the stylus is not over its bounds. 触摸、 鼠标和触笔输入存在特定的关系。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Touch Windows Vista 中的输入支持](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160818)和[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Touch Input Support in Windows Vista](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160818) and [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

public: property bool IsVisible { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示此元素在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 中是否可见。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether this element is visible in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].

value.span: 如果该元素可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the element is visible; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 确定值将许多因素考虑在内。Determination of the value takes many factors into account. 与此相反， ，这是可设置属性，仅表示想要以编程方式使元素可见或不可见。In contrast, , which is a settable property, only indicates the intention to programmatically make an element visible or invisible. 更改此属性的值通常会引发事件。Changes to the value of this property will typically raise the event. 不存在匹配[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]"上 \*"类处理重写方法，这会让某些派生类重写该行为并处理该事件，但仍可以直接与附加的类处理。There is no matching [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] "On\*" class handling override method that would allow some derived class to override that behavior and handle the event, but a class handler could still be attached directly with . 元素其中是`false`不参与输入的事件 （或命令），请执行不影响的测量或排列布局，不可获得焦点，不在 tab 键序列中，并且将不会报告中的命中测试。Elements where is `false` do not participate in input events (or commands), do not influence either the measure or arrange passes of layout, are not focusable, are not in a tab sequence, and will not be reported in hit testing. 相反，元素其中是`false`仍将参与事件或命令，以及命中测试，但不还可获得焦点。In contrast, elements where is `false` will still participate in events and commands, and hit testing, but are also not focusable. 不是要用作样式触发器。 is not intended to be used as a style trigger. 使用作为一种样式触发器可能会产生不可预知的结果。Using as a style trigger might have unpredictable results. 适用于较低级别的输入实现所检查的状态。 is intended for state checking by lower level input implementations. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件创建一个别名附加此类事件，以便摘自类的成员列出时为该类继承。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件处理程序附加到事件附加到基础附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的隧道事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 重写实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event LostFocus As RoutedEventHandler

summary.span: 在此元素丢失逻辑焦点时发生。

span.span: Occurs when this element loses logical focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有意通过某个方法调用强制失去了焦点，而前一个键盘焦点位于不同的范围内，则逻辑焦点将与键盘焦点不同。Logical focus differs from keyboard focus if focus is deliberately forced away by using a method call but the previous keyboard focus exists in a different scope. 在这种情况下、 其所在的键盘焦点保持和元素其中调用方法仍获取逻辑焦点。In this scenario, keyboard focus remains where it is, and the element where a method is called still gets logical focus. 此事件的更精确地解释是它时引发的值路线中的元素的属性更改从`true`到`false`。A more precise interpretation of this event is that it is raised when the value of the property of an element in the route changes from `true` to `false`. 由于此事件使用冒泡路由，失去焦点的元素可能是而不是元素的子元素实际附加事件处理程序。Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that loses focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 检查事件数据以确定实际获得焦点的元素中。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that gained focus. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 没有相应隧道事件。There is no corresponding tunneling event. - 重写实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在元素捕获鼠标，它会接收鼠标输入，即使在指针位于超出界限。When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input even if the pointer is outside its bounds. 通常仅在拖放操作期间捕获了鼠标。The mouse is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations. 由于此事件使用冒泡路由，丢失捕获的元素可能是而不是元素的子元素实际附加事件处理程序。Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that loses capture might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 检查事件数据以确定丢失捕获的实际元素中。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that lost capture. 此事件创建一个别名附加事件对于此类，以便摘自类的成员列出时为该类继承。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件处理程序附加到事件附加到基础附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 没有定义相应隧道事件。There is no defined corresponding tunneling event. - 重写实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 有关注册路由事件的更多信息，请参见 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的更多信息，请参见 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see . 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

span.span: Occurs when any mouse button is pressed while the pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件创建一个别名附加事件对于此类，以便摘自类的成员列出时为该类继承。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件处理程序附加到事件附加到基础附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 事件通常一起引发或，这对应于按下的某个之一的两个标准鼠标按钮。The event is often raised together with either or , which correspond to a press of one of the two standard mouse buttons. 和也是路由的事件，但它们是直接路由的事件，并引发相应的按钮特定事件时事件到达事件路由中的此元素。 and are also routed events, but they are direct routed events, and the appropriate button-specific event is raised when the event reaches this element along the event route. 请参阅备注以或。See Remarks for or . > [!IMPORTANT] > 某些控件可能具有固有鼠标按钮事件处理的类。Some controls might have inherent class handling for mouse button events. 按下事件鼠标左键是最可能的事件，能够在控件中处理的类。The left mouse button down event is the most likely event to have class handling in a control. 类通常处理标记基础类为已处理的事件。The class handling often marks the underlying class event as handled. 一旦事件被标记为已处理，其他实例处理程序附加到该元素通常不会引发。Once the event is marked handled, other instance handlers that are attached to that element are not ordinarily raised. 通常也不会引发的任何其他类或实例处理程序附加到冒泡方向向 UI 树的根节点中的元素。Any other class or instance handlers that are attached to elements in the bubbling direction towards the root in the UI tree are also not ordinarily raised. 可以解决前面的重要说明中介绍了此问题，从而仍在接收鼠标左键按下具有类处理通过使用这些解决方案的派生类上的事件的事件：You can resolve the issue that is outlined in the preceding Important and still receive events for left mouse button down events on a derived class that has class handling by using either of these solutions: - 附加处理程序未标记为已由控件处理的事件。Attach handlers for the event, which is not marked as handled by the controls. 请注意，由于这是预览事件，则路由从根开始并挖掘到控件。Notice that because this is a preview event, the route starts at the root and tunnels down to the control. - ： 分步骤注册控件上的处理程序，通过调用并选择使处理程序能够侦听事件，即使它们已标记为已处理路由的事件数据中的签名选项。Register a handler on the control procedurally by calling and choosing the signature option that enables handlers to listen for events even if they are already marked as handled in the routed event data. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的隧道事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 重写实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是[路由事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)使用直接的事件处理路由策略。 is a [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) that uses the direct event handling routing strategy. 在路由过程; 不会引发直接路由的事件相反，它们是在中处理同一个元素引发它们时。Direct routed events are not raised along a route; instead, they are handled in the same element where they are raised. 尽管跟踪何时鼠标指针进入的元素边界内，此事件能够更确切地报告属性值已更改，不再`false`到`true`针对此元素。Although tracks when the mouse pointer enters the bounds of an element, this event more literally reports that the property value has changed from `false` to `true` on this element. 此事件创建一个别名附加事件对于此类，以便摘自类的成员列出时为该类继承。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件处理程序附加到事件附加到基础附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |委托Delegate|| - 重写实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 在鼠标指针位于此元素上并且按下鼠标左键时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the left mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管这[路由事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)似乎遵循冒泡路由通过元素树，它实际上是直接的路由的事件引发和每个元素树沿遵循。Although this [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) seems to follow a bubbling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised and reraised along the element tree by each . 此事件是报告鼠标按钮特定信息的基础的几个相关事件之一事件，即处理为由事件路由每个元素的附加的事件。This event is one of several related events that report the mouse-button specifics of an underlying event, which is an attached event that is processed by each element along an event route. 此事件的事件数据公开的事件数据的基础事件。The event data of this event exposes the event data of the underlying event. 如果该事件被标记为已处理事件路由过程，则仍会引发的鼠标按钮特定事件;但是，必须通过显式调用添加的鼠标按钮特定事件的处理程序，使用选项来处理已标记为已处理的事件，以便将事件侦听器。If that event is marked as handled along the event route, the mouse-button specific events are still raised; however, handlers of the mouse-button specific events must be added by explicitly calling , with the option to handle events that are already marked as handled, in order to be listeners to the event. 如果你将标记处理，您实质上标记处理沿路由的所有其他侦听器和所有相关事件。If you mark handled, you are essentially marking handled for all further listeners along the route, and on all related events. 这可能包括类处理程序生成事件，如。This possibly includes class-handler generated events such as . 从概念上讲，将此事件 (和其他鼠标按钮事件上的) 视为鼠标"服务"(使用提供的服务定义类)。Conceptually, think of this event (and other mouse-button events on ) to be a mouse "service" (with the service definition provided by the class). 事件将添加不需要检查鼠标按钮状态 （从左至右，向上向下） 的事件数据中的原始鼠标事件的便利性。The event adds the convenience of not needing to check the mouse button states (left-right, up-down) of the original mouse events in the event data. 对于更高级的方案，例如检查非标准按钮的状态，你可能需要使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]上上类而不是那些。For more advanced scenarios, such as checking for states of non-standard buttons, you might need to use the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] on the class rather than those on . > [!IMPORTANT] > 类通常处理标记基础类为已处理的事件。The class handling often marks the underlying class event as handled. 一旦事件被标记为已处理，其他实例处理程序附加到该元素通常不会引发。Once the event is marked handled, other instance handlers that are attached to that element are not ordinarily raised. 通常也不会引发的任何其他类或实例处理程序附加到冒泡方向向 UI 树的根节点中的元素。Any other class or instance handlers that are attached to elements in the bubbling direction towards the root in the UI tree are also not ordinarily raised. 可以解决前面的重要说明中介绍了此问题，从而仍在接收鼠标左键按下具有类处理通过使用这些解决方案的派生类上的事件的事件：You can resolve the issue that is outlined in the preceding Important and still receive events for left mouse button down events on a derived class that has class handling by using either of these solutions: - 附加处理程序未标记为已由控件处理的事件。Attach handlers for the event, which is not marked as handled by the controls. 请注意，由于这是预览事件，则路由从根开始并挖掘到控件。Notice that because this is a preview event, the route starts at the root and tunnels down to the control. - ： 分步骤注册控件上的处理程序，通过调用并选择使处理程序能够侦听事件，即使它们已标记为已处理路由的事件数据中的签名选项。Register a handler on the control procedurally by calling and choosing the signature option that enables handlers to listen for events even if they are already marked as handled in the routed event data. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). summary.span: 标识 路由事件。

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 有关注册路由事件的更多信息，请参见 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的更多信息，请参见 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see . 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseLeftButtonUp As MouseButtonEventHandler

summary.span: 在鼠标指针位于此元素上并且松开鼠标左键时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the left mouse button is released while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管这[路由事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)似乎遵循冒泡路由通过元素树，它实际上是直接的路由的事件引发和每个元素树沿遵循。Although this [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) seems to follow a bubbling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised and reraised along the element tree by each . 此事件是报告鼠标按钮特定信息的基础的几个相关事件之一事件，即处理为由事件路由每个元素的附加的事件。This event is one of several related events that report the mouse-button specifics of an underlying event, which is an attached event that is processed by each element along an event route. 此事件的事件数据公开的事件数据的基础事件。The event data of this event exposes the event data of the underlying event. 如果该事件被标记为已处理事件路由过程，则仍会引发的鼠标按钮特定事件;但是，必须通过显式调用添加的鼠标按钮特定事件的处理程序，使用选项来处理已标记为已处理的事件，以便将事件侦听器。If that event is marked as handled along the event route, the mouse-button specific events are still raised; however, handlers of the mouse-button specific events must be added by explicitly calling , with the option to handle events that are already marked as handled, in order to be listeners to the event. 如果你将标记处理，您实质上标记处理沿路由的所有其他侦听器和所有相关事件。If you mark handled, you are essentially marking handled for all further listeners along the route, and on all related events. 从概念上讲，将此事件 (和其他鼠标按钮事件上的) 视为鼠标"服务"(使用提供的服务定义类)。Conceptually, think of this event (and other mouse-button events on ) to be a mouse "service" (with the service definition provided by the class). 事件将添加不需要检查鼠标按钮状态 （从左至右，向上向下） 的事件数据中的原始鼠标事件的便利性。The event adds the convenience of not needing to check the mouse button states (left-right, up-down) of the original mouse events in the event data. 对于更高级的方案，例如检查非标准按钮的状态，你可能需要使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]上上类而不是那些。For more advanced scenarios, such as checking for states of non-standard buttons, you might need to use the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] on the class rather than those on . 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |委托Delegate|| - 重写实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

Public Shared ReadOnly MouseLeftButtonUpEvent As RoutedEvent

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件创建一个别名附加事件对于此类，以便摘自类的成员列出时为该类继承。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件处理程序附加到事件附加到基础附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的隧道事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 重写实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

span.span: Occurs when the right mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管这[路由事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)似乎遵循冒泡路由通过元素树，它实际上是直接的路由的事件引发和每个元素树沿遵循。Although this [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) seems to follow a bubbling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised and reraised along the element tree by each . 此事件是报告鼠标按钮特定信息的基础的几个相关事件之一事件，即处理为由事件路由每个元素的附加的事件。This event is one of several related events that report the mouse-button specifics of an underlying event, which is an attached event that is processed by each element along an event route. 此事件的事件数据公开的事件数据的基础事件。The event data of this event exposes the event data of the underlying event. 如果该事件被标记为已处理事件路由过程，则仍会引发的鼠标按钮特定事件;但是，必须通过显式调用添加的鼠标按钮特定事件的处理程序，使用选项来处理已标记为已处理的事件，以便将事件侦听器。If that event is marked as handled along the event route, the mouse-button specific events are still raised; however, handlers of the mouse-button specific events must be added by explicitly calling , with the option to handle events that are already marked as handled, in order to be listeners to the event. 如果你将标记处理，您实质上标记处理沿路由的所有其他侦听器和所有相关事件。If you mark handled, you are essentially marking handled for all further listeners along the route, and on all related events. 这可能包括类处理程序生成事件，如。This possibly includes class-handler generated events such as . 从概念上讲，将此事件 (和其他鼠标按钮事件上的) 视为鼠标"服务"(使用提供的服务定义类)。Conceptually, think of this event (and other mouse-button events on ) to be a mouse "service" (with the service definition provided by the class). 事件将添加不需要检查鼠标按钮状态 （从左至右，向上向下） 的事件数据中的原始鼠标事件的便利性。The event adds the convenience of not needing to check the mouse button states (left-right, up-down) of the original mouse events in the event data. 对于更高级的方案，例如检查非标准按钮的状态，你可能需要使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]上上类而不是那些。For more advanced scenarios, such as checking for states of non-standard buttons, you might need to use the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] on the class rather than those on . 右侧的按钮的鼠标事件，通常在应用程序方案具有本机处理。Right button mouse events frequently have native handling in application scenarios. 例如，向下的鼠标右键按钮可能显示上下文菜单。For instance, a right mouse button down might display a context menu. 请参阅[ContextMenu 概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/contextmenu-overview.md)。See [ContextMenu Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/contextmenu-overview.md). 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is remarks.format: ## Remarks 焦点或鼠标捕获优先于其中鼠标指针位于;因此，如果你收到的已设定焦点或捕获元素中的事件，鼠标指针实际上可能是通过另一个元素。Focus or mouse capture take precedence over where the mouse pointer is; therefore, if you receive the event from a focused or captured element, the mouse pointer might actually be over another element. 此事件创建一个别名附加事件对于此类，以便摘自类的成员列出时为该类继承。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件处理程序附加到事件附加到基础附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的隧道事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 重写实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

param.span: 一个遍历请求，其中包含一个属性，该属性指示以现有 Tab 键顺序遍历的模式或视觉移动的方向。

span.span: A traversal request, which contains a property that indicates either a mode to traverse in existing tab order, or a direction to move visually.

summary.span: 尝试将焦点从此元素移到其他元素。

span.span: Attempts to move focus from this element to another element.

summary.span: 移动焦点的方向由指导方向指定，该方向在此元素的可视父级的组织结构中解释。

span.span: The direction to move focus is specified by a guidance direction, which is interpreted within the organization of the visual parent for this element.

returns.span: 如果执行了请求的遍历，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the requested traversal was performed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请确保检查此方法的返回值。Make sure you check the return value of this method. 返回值`false`如果遇到控件的组合所定义的制表位遍历并且遍历请求未请求包装可能会返回。A return value of `false` might be returned if the traversal runs into a tab stop that is defined by a control's composition, and the traversal request did not request to wrap. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: 在调用对于此元素有意义的访问键时提供类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for when an access key that is meaningful for this element is invoked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在没有实际 AccessKey 事件类，或在其他位置，您可以引发或附加处理程序。There is no actual AccessKey event in the class, or elsewhere, which you can raise or attach handlers for. 相反，此事件是通过专用管理器类， ，其中进行后续处理所有输入要搜索适用于整个输入模型的访问密钥。Instead, the event is originated via a dedicated manager class, , which post-processes all input to search for access keys that are applicable to the entire input model. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

para.span: 在此方法的默认实现将键盘焦点移到此元素 (通过调用)。

span.span: The default implementation of this method in sets keyboard focus to this element (by calling ).

para.span: 如果它们可获得焦点，因为它是可访问性方案的预期的行为，则实现应该保留此行为。

span.span: Implementations should perpetuate this behavior if they are focusable, because it is an expected behavior for accessibility scenarios.

para.span: 请注意，不执行任何操作与传递的事件数据的基实现，并且引发任何进一步的事件;它只是将焦点设置。

span.span: Note that the base implementation does nothing with the passed event data and raises no further event; it just sets the focus.

summary.span: 当某个未处理的 附加事件在其路由中到达派生自此类的某个元素时调用。

span.span: Invoked when an unhandled attached event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.

summary.span: 实现此方法可为此事件添加类处理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不具有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 由于继承的中间类可能会实现此方法，我们建议在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 此方法的目的是类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 此方法提供了一种通过建立类处理程序而不是一个实例处理程序来处理来自派生类匹配的事件。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下匹配的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为可以由子元素，它不一定的元素，将会调用处理程序引发路由的事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的实现需要检查的事件数据的源属性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不应尝试再次引发该事件在大多数情况下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 通过重写此方法或通过注册类处理程序替换，派生类的为由事件路由收到事件时，可以调用私有类处理程序方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 一个类处理适合的方案是处理的事件数据并将路由的事件标记为已处理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法，虽然但虚拟的具有引发事件的默认实现。This method, although virtual, does have a default implementation that raises the event. 这在 \* 方法实现用于引发事件，并且内部调用此方法的实现来引发事件时属性值更改。This On\* method implementation is intended to raise the event, and this same method implementation is invoked internally to raise the event when the property value changes. 实现不同于其他某些[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]上 \* 实现，后者只提供了一种简便方式为该事件添加类处理。The implementation differs from some other [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] On\* implementations, which only provide a convenient way to add class handling for that event. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

para.span: 否则为在通常将焦点设置到此元素的典型用户操作期间不会引发事件。

span.span: Otherwise, the event is not raised during typical user operations that ordinarily set focus to this element.

summary.span: 实现此方法可为此事件添加类处理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不具有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 由于继承的中间类可能会实现此方法，我们建议在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 此方法的目的是类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 此方法提供了一种通过建立类处理程序而不是一个实例处理程序来处理来自派生类匹配的事件。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下匹配的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为可以由子元素，它不一定的元素，将会调用处理程序引发路由的事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的实现需要检查的事件数据的源属性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不应尝试再次引发该事件在大多数情况下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 通过重写此方法或通过注册类处理程序替换，派生类的为由事件路由收到事件时，可以调用私有类处理程序方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 一个类处理适合的方案是处理的事件数据并将路由的事件标记为已处理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnGotStylusCapture(class System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Sub OnGotStylusCapture (e As StylusEventArgs)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不具有默认实现。The method has no default implementation. 重写在派生类来处理事件。Override in a derived class to handle the event. 一定要调用基类的方法，从而基本类对事件进行接收。Be sure to call the base class’s method so that base classes receive the event.

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此虚方法调用时的值依赖项属性更改。This virtual method is called when the value of the dependency property changes. 虚拟方法首先调用，并且可以处理所需的事件数据。The virtual method is called first and can manipulate the event data as necessary. 则与该相同的事件数据实例引发事件。Then the event is raised with that same event data instance. 请注意，事件不是路由的事件。Notice that the event is not a routed event. 因此，你不能将其标记为已处理的类处理程序中。Therefore, you cannot mark it as handled in the class handler. 此方法不具有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 由于继承的中间类可能会实现此方法，我们建议在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 你可以调用基之前或之后你特殊的处理，具体取决于你的要求。You may call base either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 击键的专用输入管理器来处理。Keystrokes are handled by a dedicated input manager. 之前被视为常规击键公开，其他编程功能，依赖于击键，例如，输入和命令绑定，可能处理击键。Other programming features that rely on keystrokes, for example, input and command bindings, might handle the keystroke before it is exposed as a general keystroke. 如果这些输入系统功能将事件标记为已处理，则不会被调用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, then is not invoked. 此方法不具有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 由于继承的中间类可能会实现此方法，我们建议在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 此方法的目的是类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 此方法提供了一种通过建立类处理程序而不是一个实例处理程序来处理来自派生类匹配的事件。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下匹配的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为可以由子元素，它不一定的元素，将会调用处理程序引发路由的事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的实现需要检查的事件数据的源属性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不应尝试再次引发该事件在大多数情况下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 通过重写此方法或通过注册类处理程序替换，派生类的为由事件路由收到事件时，可以调用私有类处理程序方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 一个类处理适合的方案是处理的事件数据并将路由的事件标记为已处理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 击键的专用输入管理器来处理。Keystrokes are handled by a dedicated input manager. 之前被视为常规击键公开，其他编程功能，依赖于击键，例如，输入和命令绑定，可能处理击键。Other programming features that rely on keystrokes, for example, input and command bindings, might handle the keystroke before it is exposed as a general keystroke. 如果这些输入系统功能将事件标记为已处理，则不会被调用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, then is not invoked. 此方法不具有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 由于继承的中间类可能会实现此方法，我们建议在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 此方法的目的是类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 此方法提供了一种通过建立类处理程序而不是一个实例处理程序来处理来自派生类匹配的事件。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下匹配的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为可以由子元素，它不一定的元素，将会调用处理程序引发路由的事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的实现需要检查的事件数据的源属性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不应尝试再次引发该事件在大多数情况下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 通过重写此方法或通过注册类处理程序替换，派生类的为由事件路由收到事件时，可以调用私有类处理程序方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 一个类处理适合的方案是处理的事件数据并将路由的事件标记为已处理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

Protected Overridable Sub OnLostFocus (e As RoutedEventArgs)

span.span: A that contains event data.

summary.span: 使用提供的事件数据引发 路由事件。

span.span: Raises the routed event by using the event data that is provided.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法，虽然但虚拟的具有引发事件的默认实现。This method, although virtual, does have a default implementation that raises the event. 这在 \* 方法实现用于引发事件，并且内部调用此方法的实现来引发事件时属性值更改。This On\* method implementation is intended to raise the event, and this same method implementation is invoked internally to raise the event when the property value changes. 此实现不同于其他某些[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]上 \* 实现，后者只提供了一种简便方式为该事件添加类处理。This implementation differs from some other [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] On\* implementations, which only provide a convenient way to add class handling for that event. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

para.span: 除非有特意需求不引发焦点事件，请确保您的实现将调用基实现。

span.span: Unless you have a deliberate and unusual need to not raise the focus events, make sure that your implementation calls the base implementation.

para.span: 否则为在通常将焦点设置到此元素的典型用户操作期间不会引发事件。

span.span: Otherwise, the event is not raised during typical user operations that ordinarily set focus to this element.

para.span: 如果不想使用您可获得焦点的元素，你可以通过将阻止元素到。

span.span: If you do not intend your element to be focusable, you can prevent the element from being focusable by setting to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不具有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 由于继承的中间类可能会实现此方法，我们建议在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 此方法的目的是类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 此方法提供了一种通过建立类处理程序而不是一个实例处理程序来处理来自派生类匹配的事件。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下匹配的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为可以由子元素，它不一定的元素，将会调用处理程序引发路由的事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的实现需要检查的事件数据的源属性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不应尝试再次引发该事件在大多数情况下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 通过重写此方法或通过注册类处理程序替换，派生类的为由事件路由收到事件时，可以调用私有类处理程序方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 一个类处理适合的方案是处理的事件数据并将路由的事件标记为已处理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理鼠标按钮操作也是通过一个专用的输入管理器。Mouse button actions are also handled by a dedicated input manager. 其他编程功能，依赖于鼠标按钮操作，例如输入和命令绑定，它公开作为常规鼠标按钮操作之前可能调用操作的处理程序。Other programming features that rely on mouse button actions, such as input and command bindings, might invoke handlers for the action before it is exposed as a general mouse button action. 如果这些输入系统功能标记事件为已处理，不会被调用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, is not invoked. 如果使用此类处理程序将该事件标记为已处理，则可能会影响以下事件：和。If you use this class handler to mark the event as handled, you potentially impact the following events: and . 任一这些事件可能会在接收元素上引发时收到。Either of these events may be raised on the receiving element when is received. 如果你将标记为已处理的类中处理此事件，则仍会引发子事件;但是，它们将传递中的事件数据的处理的状态。If you mark this event as handled in class handling, subevents are still raised; however, they pass the handled state in the event data. 如果在类处理中处理该事件，除非你显式将不会调用实例为子事件的处理程序与`handledEventsToo``true`为了附加处理程序。If the event is handled in class handling, instance handlers for the subevents are not invoked unless you explicitly use with `handledEventsToo` `true` in order to attach handlers. 类处理程序也不会调用除非这些类处理程序已注册到具有签名`handledEventsToo` `true`。Class handlers also are not invoked unless those class handlers were registered with the signature with `handledEventsToo` `true`. 通过处理，则意味着类处理负责按下操作的所有可能的鼠标按钮。By handling , you are implying that your class handling accounted for all possible mouse button down actions. 此行为可能不需要。This behavior might be unwanted. 因此，此虚方法用于将事件标记为已处理时要小心。Therefore, use caution when you use this virtual method to mark events as handled. 每个按钮特定直接事件也有一个虚拟 On \* 方法;请考虑是否重写这些按钮特定的类处理程序可能会更合适。Each of the button-specific direct events also has a virtual On\* method; consider whether overriding these button-specific class handlers might be more appropriate. 此方法不具有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 由于继承的中间类可能会实现此方法，我们建议在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 此方法的目的是类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 此方法提供了一种通过建立类处理程序而不是一个实例处理程序来处理来自派生类匹配的事件。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下匹配的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为可以由子元素，它不一定的元素，将会调用处理程序引发路由的事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的实现需要检查的事件数据的源属性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不应尝试再次引发该事件在大多数情况下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 通过重写此方法或通过注册类处理程序替换，派生类的为由事件路由收到事件时，可以调用私有类处理程序方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 一个类处理适合的方案是处理的事件数据并将路由的事件标记为已处理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
