remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件看起来进行冒泡路由，但实际上是以的间接方法。The event appears to travel a bubbling route but actually travels in an indirect way. 是基础是气泡，路由的事件和每个沿着事件路由将使用相同的处理对引发直接路由的事件。 is the underlying event that is bubble routed, and each along the event route uses identical handling to raise the direct routed event . 尽管您可以将标记为用于此元素的已处理的事件，已处理的状态不保留的其他元素为由事件路由。Although you can mark the event as handled for purposes of this element, the handled state does not perpetuate to other elements along the event route. 但是，你可能想要将事件标记为已处理为了防止常规实例处理程序 (未指定的那些`handledEventsToo`) 调用。However, you might want to mark the event as handled in order to prevent general instance handlers (those that did not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked. 常规鼠标事件处理中的默认实现侦听和将其转换为相应的本地事件。The default implementation for general mouse event handling in listens for and converts it to an appropriate local event. 如果你想要重写此逻辑，必须创建一个派生的类。If you want to override this logic, you must create a derived class. 在派生类的静态构造函数中注册的替代类处理程序。In the static constructor of your derived class, register an alternative class handler for . 无法更改鼠标处理行为通过重写。You cannot change the mouse handling behavior of by overriding . 或者，可以以更改处理特定鼠标状态的事件来重写此方法。Alternatively, you can override this method in order to change event handling for a specific mouse state. 你是否选择调用基实现取决于你的方案。Whether you choose to call the base implementation depends on your scenario. 无法调用基禁用基实现，也应调用该鼠标事件的默认输入的处理。Failing to call base disables default input handling for that mouse event on ancestor classes that also expect to invoke . 例如，你可以从派生，并重写在派生类而不会调用基实现中; 但是，此重写禁用事件。For example, you can derive from and override in your derived class without calling the base implementation; however, this override disables the event. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: 实现此方法可为此事件添加类处理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不具有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 由于继承的中间类可能会实现此方法，我们建议在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 此方法的目的是类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 此方法提供了一种通过建立类处理程序而不是一个实例处理程序来处理来自派生类匹配的事件。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下匹配的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为可以由子元素，它不一定的元素，将会调用处理程序引发路由的事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的实现需要检查的事件数据的源属性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不应尝试再次引发该事件在大多数情况下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 通过重写此方法或通过注册类处理程序替换，派生类的为由事件路由收到事件时，可以调用私有类处理程序方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 一个类处理适合的方案是处理的事件数据并将路由的事件标记为已处理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

在派生类中此替代禁用上下文菜单上的服务控件，都是一部分的默认行为。For example, you can derive from and override in your derived class without calling base; however, this override disables the context menu services on your control, which are part of the default behavior. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理鼠标按钮操作也是通过一个专用的输入管理器。Mouse button actions are also handled by a dedicated input manager. 其他编程功能，依赖于鼠标按钮操作，例如输入和命令绑定，它公开作为常规鼠标按钮操作之前可能调用操作的处理程序。Other programming features that rely on mouse button actions, such as input and command bindings, might invoke handlers for the action before it is exposed as a general mouse button action. 如果这些输入系统功能标记事件为已处理，不会被调用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, is not invoked. 如果使用此类处理程序将该事件标记为已处理，则可能会影响以下事件：和。If you use this class handler to mark the event as handled, you potentially impact the following events: and . 上述任一事件，可能会引发接收元素上时收到。Either of these events might be raised on the receiving element when is received. 如果你将标记为已处理的类中处理此事件，则仍会引发子事件;但是，它们将传递中的事件数据的处理的状态。If you mark this event as handled in class handling, subevents are still raised; however, they pass the handled state in the event data. 如果在类处理中处理该事件，除非你显式将不会调用实例为子事件的处理程序与`handledEventsToo``true`为了附加处理程序。If the event is handled in class handling, instance handlers for the subevents are not invoked unless you explicitly use with `handledEventsToo` `true` in order to attach handlers. 类处理程序也不会调用除非这些类处理程序已注册到具有签名`handledEventsToo` `true`。Class handlers also are not invoked unless those class handlers were registered with the signature with `handledEventsToo` `true`. 通过处理，则意味着，在类处理说明进行操作的所有可能的鼠标按钮。By handling , you are implying that your class handling accounted for all possible mouse button up actions. 此行为可能不需要。This behavior might be unwanted. 因此，此虚方法用于将事件标记为已处理时要小心。Therefore, use caution when you use this virtual method to mark events as handled. 每个按钮特定直接事件也有一个虚拟 On \* 方法;请考虑是否重写这些按钮特定的类处理程序可能会更合适。Each of the button-specific direct events also has a virtual On\* method; consider whether overriding these button-specific class handlers might be more appropriate. 此方法不具有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 由于继承的中间类可能会实现此方法，我们建议在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 此方法的目的是类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 此方法提供了一种通过建立类处理程序而不是一个实例处理程序来处理来自派生类匹配的事件。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下匹配的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为可以由子元素，它不一定的元素，将会调用处理程序引发路由的事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的实现需要检查的事件数据的源属性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不应尝试再次引发该事件在大多数情况下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 通过重写此方法或通过注册类处理程序替换，派生类的为由事件路由收到事件时，可以调用私有类处理程序方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 一个类处理适合的方案是处理的事件数据并将路由的事件标记为已处理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不具有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 由于继承的中间类可能会实现此方法，我们建议在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 此方法的目的是类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 此方法提供了一种通过建立类处理程序而不是一个实例处理程序来处理来自派生类匹配的事件。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下匹配的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为可以由子元素，它不一定的元素，将会调用处理程序引发路由的事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的实现需要检查的事件数据的源属性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不应尝试再次引发该事件在大多数情况下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 通过重写此方法或通过注册类处理程序替换，派生类的为由事件路由收到事件时，可以调用私有类处理程序方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 一个类处理适合的方案是处理的事件数据并将路由的事件标记为已处理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 另一个专用于预览事件的情况是将已处理，以便匹配冒泡类处理程序不会调用其标记。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void OnPreviewDragLeave (System.Windows.DragEventArgs e);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnPreviewDragLeave(class System.Windows.DragEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Sub OnPreviewDragLeave (e As DragEventArgs)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不具有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 由于继承的中间类可能会实现此方法，我们建议在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 此方法的目的是类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 此方法提供了一种通过建立类处理程序而不是一个实例处理程序来处理来自派生类匹配的事件。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下匹配的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为可以由子元素，它不一定的元素，将会调用处理程序引发路由的事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的实现需要检查的事件数据的源属性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不应尝试再次引发该事件在大多数情况下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 通过重写此方法或通过注册类处理程序替换，派生类的为由事件路由收到事件时，可以调用私有类处理程序方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 一个类处理适合的方案是处理的事件数据并将路由的事件标记为已处理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 另一个专用于预览事件的情况是将已处理，以便匹配冒泡类处理程序不会调用其标记。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnPreviewMouseDown(class System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Sub OnPreviewMouseDown (e As MouseButtonEventArgs)

param.name: e

span.span: The that contains the event data.

param.span: 事件数据报告称已按下一个或多个鼠标按钮。

span.span: The event data reports that one or more mouse buttons were pressed.

summary.span: 当某个未处理的 附加路由事件在其路由中到达派生自此类的某个元素时调用。

span.span: Invoked when an unhandled attached routed event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.

summary.span: 实现此方法可为此事件添加类处理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理鼠标按钮操作也是通过一个专用的输入管理器。Mouse button actions are also handled by a dedicated input manager. 其他编程功能，依赖于鼠标按钮操作，例如输入和命令绑定，它公开作为常规鼠标按钮操作之前可能调用操作的处理程序。Other programming features that rely on mouse button actions, such as input and command bindings, might invoke handlers for the action before it is exposed as a general mouse button action. 如果这些输入系统功能标记事件为已处理，不会被调用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, is not invoked. 如果使用此类处理程序将该事件标记为已处理，则可能会影响以下事件：和。If you use this class handler to mark the event as handled, you potentially impact the following events: and . 任一这些事件可能会在接收元素上引发时收到。Either of these events may be raised on the receiving element when is received. 如果你将标记为已处理的类中处理此事件，则仍会引发子事件;但是，它们将传递中的事件数据的处理的状态。If you mark this event as handled in class handling, subevents are still raised; however, they pass the handled state in the event data. 如果在类处理中处理该事件，除非你显式将不会调用实例为子事件的处理程序与`handledEventsToo``true`为了附加处理程序。If the event is handled in class handling, instance handlers for the subevents are not invoked unless you explicitly use with `handledEventsToo` `true` in order to attach handlers. 类处理程序也不会调用除非这些类处理程序已注册到具有签名`handledEventsToo` `true`。Class handlers also are not invoked unless those class handlers were registered with the signature with `handledEventsToo` `true`. 通过处理，则意味着类处理负责按下操作的所有可能的鼠标按钮。By handling , you are implying that your class handling accounted for all possible mouse button down actions. 此行为可能不需要。This behavior might be unwanted. 因此，此虚方法用于将事件标记为已处理时要小心。Therefore, use caution when you use this virtual method to mark events as handled. 每个按钮特定直接事件也有一个虚拟 On \* 方法;请考虑是否重写这些按钮特定的类处理程序可能会更合适。Each of the button-specific direct events also has a virtual On\* method; consider whether overriding these button-specific class handlers might be more appropriate. 此方法不具有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 由于继承的中间类可能会实现此方法，我们建议在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 此方法的目的是类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 此方法提供了一种通过建立类处理程序而不是一个实例处理程序来处理来自派生类匹配的事件。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下匹配的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为可以由子元素，它不一定的元素，将会调用处理程序引发路由的事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的实现需要检查的事件数据的源属性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不应尝试再次引发该事件在大多数情况下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 通过重写此方法或通过注册类处理程序替换，派生类的为由事件路由收到事件时，可以调用私有类处理程序方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 一个类处理适合的方案是处理的事件数据并将路由的事件标记为已处理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 另一个专用于预览事件的情况是将已处理，以便匹配冒泡类处理程序不会调用其标记。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: 当某个未处理的 路由事件在其路由中到达派生自此类的某个元素时调用。

span.span: Invoked when an unhandled routed event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.

summary.span: 实现此方法可为此事件添加类处理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件看起来进行隧道路由，但实际上是以的间接方法。The event appears to travel a tunneling route but actually travels in an indirect way. 是为隧道路由，并且每个基础事件沿着事件路由将使用相同的处理对引发直接路由的事件。 is the underlying event that is tunnel routed, and each along the event route uses identical handling to raise the direct routed event . 尽管您可以将标记为用于此元素的已处理的事件，已处理的状态不保留的其他元素为由事件路由。Although you can mark the event as handled for purposes of this element, the handled state does not perpetuate to other elements along the event route. 但是，你可能想要将事件标记为已处理为了防止常规实例处理程序 (未指定的那些`handledEventsToo`) 调用。However, you might want to mark the event as handled in order to prevent general instance handlers (those that did not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked. 常规鼠标事件处理中的默认实现侦听和将其转换为相应的本地事件。The default implementation for general mouse event handling in listens for and converts it to an appropriate local event. 如果你想要重写此逻辑，必须创建一个派生的类。If you want to override this logic, you must create a derived class. 在派生类的静态构造函数中注册的替代类处理程序。In the static constructor of your derived class, register an alternative class handler for . 无法更改鼠标处理行为通过重写。You cannot change the mouse handling behavior of by overriding . 或者，可以以更改处理特定鼠标状态的事件来重写此方法。Alternatively, you can override this method in order to change event handling for a specific mouse state. 你是否选择调用基实现取决于你的方案。Whether you choose to call the base implementation depends on your scenario. 无法调用基禁用基实现，也应调用该鼠标事件的默认输入的处理。Failing to call base disables default input handling for that mouse event on ancestor classes that also expect to invoke . 例如，你可以从派生，并重写在派生类而不会调用基实现中; 但是，此重写禁用事件。For example, you can derive from and override in your derived class without calling the base implementation; however, this override disables the event. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理鼠标按钮操作也是通过一个专用的输入管理器。Mouse button actions are also handled by a dedicated input manager. 其他编程功能，依赖于鼠标按钮操作，例如输入和命令绑定，它公开作为常规鼠标按钮操作之前可能调用操作的处理程序。Other programming features that rely on mouse button actions, such as input and command bindings, might invoke handlers for the action before it is exposed as a general mouse button action. 如果这些输入系统功能标记事件为已处理，不会被调用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, is not invoked. 如果使用此类处理程序将该事件标记为已处理，则可能会影响以下事件：和。If you use this class handler to mark the event as handled, you potentially impact the following events: and . 上述任一事件，可能会引发接收元素上时收到。Either of these events might be raised on the receiving element when is received. 如果你将标记为已处理的类中处理此事件，则仍会引发子事件;但是，它们将传递中的事件数据的处理的状态。If you mark this event as handled in class handling, subevents are still raised; however, they pass the handled state in the event data. 如果在类处理中处理该事件，除非你显式将不会调用实例为子事件的处理程序与`handledEventsToo``true`为了附加处理程序。If the event is handled in class handling, instance handlers for the subevents are not invoked unless you explicitly use with `handledEventsToo` `true` in order to attach handlers. 类处理程序也不会调用除非这些类处理程序已注册到具有签名`handledEventsToo` `true`。Class handlers also are not invoked unless those class handlers were registered with the signature with `handledEventsToo` `true`. 通过处理，则意味着，在类处理说明进行操作的所有可能的鼠标按钮。By handling , you are implying that your class handling accounted for all possible mouse button up actions. 此行为可能不需要。This behavior might be unwanted. 因此，此虚方法用于将事件标记为已处理时要小心。Therefore, use caution when you use this virtual method to mark events as handled. 每个按钮特定直接事件也有一个虚拟 On \* 方法;请考虑是否重写这些按钮特定的类处理程序可能会更合适。Each of the button-specific direct events also has a virtual On\* method; consider whether overriding these button-specific class handlers might be more appropriate. 此方法不具有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 由于继承的中间类可能会实现此方法，我们建议在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 此方法的目的是类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 此方法提供了一种通过建立类处理程序而不是一个实例处理程序来处理来自派生类匹配的事件。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下匹配的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为可以由子元素，它不一定的元素，将会调用处理程序引发路由的事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的实现需要检查的事件数据的源属性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不应尝试再次引发该事件在大多数情况下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 通过重写此方法或通过注册类处理程序替换，派生类的为由事件路由收到事件时，可以调用私有类处理程序方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 一个类处理适合的方案是处理的事件数据并将路由的事件标记为已处理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnPreviewMouseWheel(class System.Windows.Input.MouseWheelEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Sub OnPreviewMouseWheel (e As MouseWheelEventArgs)

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不具有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 由于继承的中间类可能会实现此方法，我们建议在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 此方法的目的是类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 此方法提供了一种通过建立类处理程序而不是一个实例处理程序来处理来自派生类匹配的事件。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下匹配的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为可以由子元素，它不一定的元素，将会调用处理程序引发路由的事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的实现需要检查的事件数据的源属性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不应尝试再次引发该事件在大多数情况下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 通过重写此方法或通过注册类处理程序替换，派生类的为由事件路由收到事件时，可以调用私有类处理程序方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 一个类处理适合的方案是处理的事件数据并将路由的事件标记为已处理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 另一个专用于预览事件的情况是将已处理，以便匹配冒泡类处理程序不会调用其标记。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为可以由子元素，它不一定的元素，将会调用处理程序引发路由的事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的实现需要检查的事件数据的源属性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不应尝试再次引发该事件在大多数情况下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 通过重写此方法或通过注册类处理程序替换，派生类的为由事件路由收到事件时，可以调用私有类处理程序方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 一个类处理适合的方案是处理的事件数据并将路由的事件标记为已处理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 另一个专用于预览事件的情况是将已处理，以便匹配冒泡类处理程序不会调用其标记。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

Protected Friend Overridable Sub OnPreviewStylusMove (e As StylusEventArgs)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不具有默认实现。The method has no default implementation. 重写在派生类来处理事件。Override in a derived class to handle the event. 一定要调用基类的方法，从而基本类对事件进行接收。Be sure to call the base class’s method so that base classes receive the event.

On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为可以由子元素，它不一定的元素，将会调用处理程序引发路由的事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的实现需要检查的事件数据的源属性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不应尝试再次引发该事件在大多数情况下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 通过重写此方法或通过注册类处理程序替换，派生类的为由事件路由收到事件时，可以调用私有类处理程序方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 一个类处理适合的方案是处理的事件数据并将路由的事件标记为已处理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

Protected Friend Overridable Sub OnStylusButtonDown (e As StylusButtonEventArgs)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不具有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 由于继承的中间类可能会实现此方法，我们建议在实现中调用基实现。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 你可以调用基之前或之后你特殊的处理，具体取决于你的要求。You may call base either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements. 此方法的目的是类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 此方法提供了一种通过建立类处理程序而不是一个实例处理程序来处理来自派生类匹配的事件。The purpose of this method is similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下匹配的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 将事件标记为已处理是仍可用于预防典型实例处理程序 (未指定的那些`handledEventsToo`) 调用。Marking the event as handled is still useful for preventing typical instance handlers (those that do not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为可以由子元素，它不一定的元素，将会调用处理程序引发路由的事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的实现需要检查的事件数据的源属性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不应尝试再次引发该事件在大多数情况下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 通过重写此方法或通过注册类处理程序替换，派生类的为由事件路由收到事件时，可以调用私有类处理程序方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 一个类处理适合的方案是处理的事件数据并将路由的事件标记为已处理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnUpdateModel() cil managed

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，会参与呈现操作。

span.span: Participates in rendering operations when overridden in a derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你从派生类类，你可以使用此方法连同方法来刷新元素的模型。When you derive a class from the class, you can use this method together with the method to refresh the model of the element. 只需在高级方案中调用此方法。You only need to call this method in advanced scenarios. 如果派生的类具有的外观的多个属性，并且你想要一次更新的基础模型，这种类型的一个高级的方案。One such advanced scenario is if the derived class has multiple properties that affect the appearance, and you want to update the underlying model only once. 在方法无法更新属性类。Within the method you could update the property of the class. 在此方法有没有默认实现类。This method has no default implementation in the class. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从派生类，以创建`Sphere`类：The following example shows how to derive from the class to create a `Sphere` class: [!code-csharp[Shapes#Sphere](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Shapes/CSharp/Sphere.cs#sphere)] [!code-vb[Shapes#Sphere](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Shapes/visualbasic/sphere.vb#sphere)] 有关完整的示例，请参阅[UIElement3D 球示例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160044)。For the complete sample, see [UIElement3D Sphere Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160044).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件创建一个别名附加事件对于此类，以便摘自类的成员列出时为该类继承。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件处理程序附加到事件附加到基础附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|隧道Tunneling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的冒泡事件。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 重写实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 标识 路由事件。

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 有关注册路由事件的更多信息，请参见 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的更多信息，请参见 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see . 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown As MouseButtonEventHandler

summary.span: 在鼠标指针位于此元素上并且按下鼠标左键时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the left mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管这[路由事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)似乎遵循隧道路由通过元素树，它实际上是直接的路由的事件引发和每个元素树沿遵循。Although this [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) seems to follow a tunneling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised and reraised along the element tree by each . 此事件是报告鼠标按钮特定信息的基础的几个相关事件之一事件，即处理为由事件路由每个元素的附加的事件。This event is one of several related events that report the mouse-button specifics of an underlying event, which is an attached event that is processed by each element along an event route. 此事件的事件数据公开的事件数据的基础事件。The event data of this event exposes the event data of the underlying event. 如果该事件被标记为已处理事件路由过程，则仍会引发的鼠标按钮特定事件;但是，必须通过显式调用添加的鼠标按钮特定事件的处理程序，使用选项来处理已标记为已处理的事件，以便将事件侦听器。If that event is marked as handled along the event route, the mouse-button specific events are still raised; however, handlers of the mouse-button specific events must be added by explicitly calling , with the option to handle events that are already marked as handled, in order to be listeners to the event. 如果你将标记处理，您实质上标记处理沿路由的所有其他侦听器和所有相关事件。If you mark handled, you are essentially marking handled for all further listeners along the route, and on all related events. 这可能包括类处理程序生成事件，如。This possibly includes class-handler generated events such as . 从概念上讲，将此事件 (和其他鼠标按钮事件上的) 视为鼠标"服务"(使用提供的服务定义类)。Conceptually, think of this event (and other mouse-button events on ) to be a mouse "service" (with the service definition provided by the class). 事件将添加不需要检查鼠标按钮状态 （从左至右，向上向下） 的事件数据中的原始鼠标事件的便利性。The event adds the convenience of not needing to check the mouse button states (left-right, up-down) of the original mouse events in the event data. 对于更高级的方案，例如检查非标准按钮的状态，你可能需要使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]上上类而不是那些。For more advanced scenarios, such as checking for states of non-standard buttons, you might need to use the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] on the class rather than those on . 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |委托Delegate|| - 重写实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.RoutedEvent PreviewMouseLeftButtonDownEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly PreviewMouseLeftButtonDownEvent As RoutedEvent

summary.span: 标识 路由事件。

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 有关注册路由事件的更多信息，请参见 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的更多信息，请参见 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see . 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: 在鼠标指针位于此元素上并且移动鼠标指针时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the mouse pointer moves while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 都会发生此事件当鼠标指针首次进入入元素边界，并还鼠标指针移动时仍剩余元素的边界内。This event occurs both when the mouse pointer first enters into the element bounds, and also when the mouse pointer moves while still remaining within the element bounds. 此事件创建一个别名附加事件对于此类，以便摘自类的成员列出时为该类继承。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件处理程序附加到事件附加到基础附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|隧道Tunneling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的冒泡事件。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 重写实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 焦点或鼠标捕获优先于其中鼠标指针位于;因此，如果您收到此事件来自的已设定焦点或捕获元素，鼠标指针实际上可能通过另一个元素。Focus or mouse capture take precedence over where the mouse pointer is; therefore, if you receive this event from a focused or captured element, the mouse pointer might actually be over another element. 此事件创建一个别名附加事件对于此类，以便摘自类的成员列出时为该类继承。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件处理程序附加到事件附加到基础附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|隧道Tunneling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的冒泡事件。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 重写实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件允许组件或应用程序侦听的文本输入以独立于设备的方式。The event allows a component or application to listen for text input in a device-independent manner. 键盘是主种; 但语音、 手写和其他输入的设备还可以生成。The keyboard is the primary means of ; but speech, handwriting, and other input devices can also generate . 由于键组合 — 默认键盘或输入的法编辑器-多个键事件可能会引发一个文本输入的事件。Because of key combinations—either in default keyboards or through input method editors—multiple key events may raise just one text input event. 此事件创建一个别名附加事件对于此类，以便摘自类的成员列出时为该类继承。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件处理程序附加到事件附加到基础附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|隧道Tunneling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的冒泡事件。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 重写实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

span.span: Occurs when a finger touches the screen while the finger is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，和事件手指触摸屏幕并移动之前不会发生。By default, the and events do not occur until a finger touches the screen and moves. 手指在屏幕上按住但不移动会导致按并保存行为。Pressing a finger on the screen and holding it without moving it causes the press and hold behavior of a . 按下并保持行为相当于鼠标右键单击。The press and hold behavior is equivalent to a mouse right-click. 若要使和事件发生只要的手指触摸屏幕上，设置附加到属性`false`此元素。To cause the and events to occur as soon as a finger touches the screen, set the attached property to `false` for this element. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|隧道Tunneling| |委托Delegate|类型。 of type .| - 对应的冒泡事件。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 重写实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event QueryCursor As QueryCursorEventHandler

summary.span: 当请求显示光标时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the cursor is requested to display.

summary.span: 每次鼠标指针移至新位置时都会在一个元素上引发此事件，这意味着光标对象可能需要根据其新位置进行更改。

span.span: This event is raised on an element each time that the mouse pointer moves to a new location, which means the cursor object might need to be changed based on its new position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件创建一个别名附加事件对于此类，以便摘自类的成员列出时为该类继承。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件处理程序附加到事件附加到基础附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 此事件名称引用光标不一定是文本光标 （有时称为插入点）。The cursor being referred to by this event name is not necessarily the text cursor (sometimes known as the insertion point). 相反，此上下文中的光标是声明的屏幕的图形显示与多个可能的输入相关的设备或中的概念相关的对象[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win-md.md)]编程。Instead, the cursor in this context is the object that declares the onscreen graphical display related to several possible input-related devices or concepts in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win-md.md)] programming. 该对象表示由类[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。That object is represented by the class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]在输入的系统使你能够更改此光标时它表示鼠标指针的屏幕位置。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input system enables you to change this cursor when it represents the onscreen position of the mouse pointer. 你可以使用从的预定义的值枚举，也可以声明自定义光标以图像文件。You can use predefined values from the enumeration, or you can declare a custom cursor as an image file. 侦听事件不是游标管理的有效技术。Listening for the event is not an efficient technique for cursor management. 相反，每个元素应定义其自己的游标行为与和。Instead, each element should define its own cursor behavior with and . 你应仅依赖于如果你不使用 WPF 框架级别基元素，或中的特殊情况下，基于每个元素中定义的游标行为不满足你的需求。You should only rely on if you are not using the WPF framework-level base elements, or in extraordinary circumstances where defining cursor behavior on a per-element basis does not meet your needs. 有关详细信息在响应中实现的游标行为，请参阅。For more information on implementing cursor behavior in response to , see . 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 没有定义相应隧道事件。There is no defined corresponding tunneling event. - 重写实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 引发特定路由事件。

span.span: Raises a specific routed event.

summary.span: 在提供的 实例中标识要引发的 （作为该事件数据的 属性）。

span.span: The to be raised is identified within the instance that is provided (as the property of that event data).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `e`参数被类型化为所有路由的事件数据的公共基类型; 但是，应作为最特定的事件数据类型，则使用有关要引发事件，因为给定的事件数据派生的类包含适用于特定事件时将引发此事件的实际的特定数据属性。The `e` parameter is typed as the common base type for all routed event data; however, the event data should be given as the most specific event data type that is available for the event being raised, because derived classes contain the actual specific data properties that are intended for the specific event when it is raised. 不只是事件; 的状态属性它还标识要引发的路由的事件。 is not just the state properties for the event; it also identifies which routed event to raise. 此事件引发模式和路由的事件数据均不同于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件和数据类，该类通常只包含与事件相关的属性。This event-raising pattern and the routed event data both differ from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] events and data classes, which typically just contain properties that are related to the event. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public void RemoveHandler (System.Windows.RoutedEvent routedEvent, Delegate handler);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RemoveHandler(class System.Windows.RoutedEvent routedEvent, class System.Delegate handler) cil managed
public: virtual void RemoveHandler(System::Windows::RoutedEvent ^ routedEvent, Delegate ^ handler);

param.name: routedEvent
param.span: 附加了处理程序的路由事件的标识符。

span.span: The identifier of the routed event for which the handler is attached.

param.name: handler
param.span: 要从此元素的事件处理程序集合中删除的特定处理程序实现。

span.span: The specific handler implementation to remove from the event handler collection on this element.

summary.span: 从此元素中删除指定的路由事件处理程序。

span.span: Removes the specified routed event handler from this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最常见的方案使用此[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)]，在实现[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]"包装器"自定义的路由事件，特别是，当你实现处理程序的"删除"逻辑与关联的事件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]级别。The most common scenario for using this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)] is when you implement the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] "wrapper" event that is associated with a custom routed event, specifically when you implement the "remove" logic for handlers at the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] level. 如果没有注册的使用匹配方法调用的输入的参数的条件没有处理程序，则调用此方法起任何作用。Calling this method has no effect if there were no handlers registered with criteria that match the input parameters for the method call. 如果多个处理程序附加条件相匹配，仅第一个处理程序事件删除处理程序存储区中。If more than one handler is attached that matched the criteria, only the first handler in the event handler store is removed. 此行为是与一致[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]行为`-=`运算符。This behavior is consistent with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] behavior of the `-=` operator. 既不`routedEvent`也不`handler`可能`null`。Neither `routedEvent` nor `handler` may be `null`. 尝试提供上述任意值作为`null`将引发的异常。Attempting to provide either value as `null` will raise an exception. 此方法将忽略`handledEventsToo`参数信息，如果处理程序最初提供添加与启用的已处理事件的处理的签名。This method ignores the `handledEventsToo` parameter information, which is provided if the handler was first added with the signature that enables handling of already-handled events. 删除任一类型的处理程序。Either type of handler is removed. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

span.span: if the property value should be serialized; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这将返回`true`如果本地设置。This will return `true` if is locally set. 这`ShouldSerialize`提供方法，因为属性不具有简单的默认值。This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the property does not have a simple default value. 此方法指示属性是否已从其默认值。This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value. 如果你正在开发的设计器，或可以开发自己的控件包含通常调用此方法。You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer or developing your own control incorporating a . 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 ShouldSerialize 和重置方法定义默认值](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/defining-default-values-with-the-shouldserialize-and-reset-methods.md)。For more information, see [Defining Default Values with the ShouldSerialize and Reset Methods](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/defining-default-values-with-the-shouldserialize-and-reset-methods.md). 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件创建一个别名附加事件对于此类，以便摘自类的成员列出时为该类继承。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件处理程序附加到事件附加到基础附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 触摸、 鼠标和触笔输入存在特定的关系。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Touch Windows Vista 中的输入支持](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160818)和[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Touch Input Support in Windows Vista](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160818) and [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的隧道事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 重写实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 在触笔进入此元素的边界时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the stylus enters the bounds of this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是[路由事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)使用直接的事件处理路由策略。 is a [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) that uses the direct event handling routing strategy. 在路由过程; 不会引发直接路由的事件相反，它们是在中处理同一个元素引发它们时。Direct routed events are not raised along a route; instead, they are handled in the same element where they are raised. 但是，它们启用路由的事件的行为，如样式中的事件触发器其他的方面。However, they do enable other aspects of routed event behavior, such as event triggers in styles. 尽管跟踪何时触笔进入的元素边界内，此事件能够更确切地报告属性值已更改，不再`false`到`true`针对此元素。Although tracks when the stylus enters the bounds of an element, this event more literally reports that the property value has changed from `false` to `true` on this element. 此事件创建一个别名附加事件对于此类，以便摘自类的成员列出时为该类继承。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件处理程序附加到事件附加到基础附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 触摸、 鼠标和触笔输入存在特定的关系。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Touch Windows Vista 中的输入支持](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160818)和[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Touch Input Support in Windows Vista](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160818) and [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |委托Delegate|| - 重写实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件创建一个别名附加事件对于此类，以便摘自类的成员列出时为该类继承。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件处理程序附加到事件附加到基础附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 触摸、 鼠标和触笔输入存在特定的关系。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Touch Windows Vista 中的输入支持](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160818)和[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Touch Input Support in Windows Vista](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160818) and [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的隧道事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 重写实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

span.span: Occurs when the stylus leaves the bounds of the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是[路由事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)使用直接的事件处理路由策略。 is a [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) that uses the direct event handling routing strategy. 在路由过程; 不会引发直接路由的事件相反，它们是在中处理同一个元素引发它们时。Direct routed events are not raised along a route; instead, they are handled in the same element where they are raised. 但是，它们启用路由的事件的行为，如样式中的事件触发器其他的方面。However, they do enable other aspects of routed event behavior, such as event triggers in styles. 尽管触笔离开元素，此事件的边界的详细信息时，跟踪确切地报告属性值已更改，不再`true`到`false`针对此元素。Although tracks when the stylus leaves the bounds of an element, this event more literally reports that the property value has changed from `true` to `false` on this element. 此事件创建一个别名附加事件对于此类，以便摘自类的成员列出时为该类继承。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件处理程序附加到事件附加到基础附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 触摸、 鼠标和触笔输入存在特定的关系。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Touch Windows Vista 中的输入支持](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160818)和[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Touch Input Support in Windows Vista](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160818) and [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |委托Delegate|| - 重写实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 在此元素以设备无关模式获取文本时发生。

span.span: Occurs when this element gets text in a device-independent manner.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件允许组件或应用程序侦听的文本输入以独立于设备的方式。The event allows a component or application to listen for text input in a device-independent manner. 键盘是主种，但语音、 手写和其他输入的设备也可以引发。The keyboard is the primary means of , but speech, handwriting, and other input devices can also raise . 由于键组合 — 默认键盘或输入的法编辑器-多个键事件可能会引发一个文本输入的事件。Because of key combinations—either in default keyboards or through input method editors—multiple key events might raise just one text input event. 此事件创建一个别名附加事件对于此类，以便摘自类的成员列出时为该类继承。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件处理程序附加到事件附加到基础附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 对应的隧道事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 重写实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 有关注册路由事件的更多信息，请参见 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的更多信息，请参见 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see . 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: 当悬停在此元素上方的手指触摸屏幕时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a finger touches the screen while the finger is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，和事件手指触摸屏幕并移动之前不会发生。By default, the and events do not occur until a finger touches the screen and moves. 手指在屏幕上按住但不移动会导致按并保存行为。Pressing a finger on the screen and holding it without moving it causes the press and hold behavior of a . 按下并保持行为相当于鼠标右键单击。The press and hold behavior is equivalent to a mouse right-click. 若要使和事件发生只要的手指触摸屏幕上，设置附加到属性`false`此元素。To cause the and events to occur as soon as a finger touches the screen, set the attached property to `false` for this element. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|类型。 of type .| - 对应的隧道事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 重写实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性将影响的值，这反过来可能会引起事件。Setting this property affects the value of , which in turn may raise the event. 但是，具有其他因素影响，例如包含它的父项的可见性设置。However, has other factors that influence it, for instance the visibility settings of parents that contain it. 元素其中不不参与输入的事件 （或命令） 和不会报告中的命中测试。Elements where is not do not participate in input events (or commands) and are not reported in hit testing. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
